config.neo4j.topic.cypher.ckn_model_change:
MERGE (server:Server {server_id: event.server_id})
      MERGE (model:Model {model_id: event.model_id})
      MERGE (depl:Deployment {deployment_id: event.deployment_id})
        ON CREATE SET
          depl.timestamp = event.timestamp,
          depl.status = event.status,
          depl.avg_accuracy = COALESCE(event.avg_accuracy, NULL),
          depl.avg_qoe = COALESCE(event.avg_qoe, NULL),
          depl.avg_cpu_power = COALESCE(event.avg_cpu_power, NULL),
          depl.avg_gpu_power = COALESCE(event.avg_gpu_power, NULL)
      MERGE (server)-[:DEPLOYED]->(depl)
      MERGE (model)-[:DEPLOYED_IN]->(depl)
